channel.title: Tutorial-Basic Scar Interface
channel.description:
Ok downloaded attach pic of scar inter face it shows begginers what does what
1- Select Client window, this is so that the script can be uses on all computers it is ver important you set this while running a script or when making one.To use it click on it hold down the click and drag it onto the runescape screen.
2-Run , very important this starts the script.make sure you set client window before you hit run.
3-Stop-stops running the script
4-Colour picker-So damn important, click once and drag over either what colour you are trying to get or what corodiantes you want to get both will be displayed in the little box in the bottom.
5-This is your main scripting area all scar code is displayed here.
hope it helped

item.title: Tutorial-Basic Scar Interface
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

Ok downloaded attach pic of scar inter face it shows begginers what does what

1- Select Client window, this is so that the script can be uses on all computers it is ver important you set this while running a script or when making one.To use it click on it hold down the click and drag it onto the runescape screen.

2-Run , very important this starts the script.make sure you set client window before you hit run.

3-Stop-stops running the script

4-Colour picker-So damn important, click once and drag over either what colour you are trying to get or what corodiantes you want to get both will be displayed in the little box in the bottom.

5-This is your main scripting area all scar code is displayed here.

hope it helped
